attributes.long-description:
In "OUTATIME", the season finale of this 5 game series, lives are changed, mysteries are solved, and paradoxes are avoided as Young Emmett seals his fate, sending Marty and Doc on a climactic chase through Hill Valley's past, present, and future.

* New Back to the Future™ story across 5 episodes.
* Christopher Lloyd (Doc), Claudia Wells (Jennifer) and a certain Surprise Guest all return to voice the cast!
* Back to the Future™'s 'first families'. The McFlys, Browns, and of course, the Tannens – all play key roles.
* Collaboration with Trilogy Co-Creator/Writer Bob Gale to help in shaping the storyline.

You will download each episode individually, locating them through "View All by Title" and selecting "Back to the Future™: The Game."

attributes.name: Back to the Future™: Episode 5 - OUTATIME
